shows.title: Natural Remedies / Folklore, Magic, & Plants
shows.first_half: First Half: Pharmacist Ben Fuchs will discuss natural health remedies and the vitamins, nutrients, and minerals that our bodies need to maintain good health.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author, traveler, lover of the strange, Varla Ventura will talk about her latest works on folklore, magic, and the supernatural, as well as her exploration of the cultural and mythological significance of plants.

shows.title: Green Energy Critique / Paranormal Realities
shows.first_half: First Half: Author Steve Goreham, Executive Director of the Climate Science Coalition of America, argues that the theory of man-made global warming and climate change is inaccurate, and warns of a coming green energy breakdown, with stresses placed on the grid due to rising demand for electric power.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Researcher of paranormal mysteries and cover-ups, Andy Thomas, will discuss the implications of his new book "Strange: Paranormal Realities in the Everyday World," which records and analyzes the many paranormal experiences being experienced by a huge number of very ordinary people.

shows.title: Close Encounters / Crop Circle Mysteries
shows.first_half: First Half: Author of over 25 bestselling books, Whitley Strieber has been a longtime supporter of alternative concepts. He is an expert in diverse subjects, including strange implants, the afterlife, and aliens. He'll share his latest close encounters as well as developments in disclosure.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Patty Greer is a filmmaker, public speaker, and researcher of crop circles and plasma science. She'll discuss crop circles and how they are conceived and delivered, based on years of fieldwork and collaboration with Penny Kelly, who worked closely with the scientist W.C. Levengood.

shows.title: Open Lines
shows.first_half: In the first half, Richard Syrett will speak with guest(s) to be announced. Followed by Open Lines. Give Richard Syrett a call and discuss whatever is on your mind!
